description: This file declares internal API functions for the TLS Alert Handler object within a TLS implementation, including functions for receiving and sending data and alerts.

methods.name: TlsAhoRecv
methods.description: Handles the reception of data buffers within the TLS Alert Handler.

methods.name: TlsAhoSend
methods.description: Handles sending data buffers from the TLS Alert Handler.

methods.name: TlsAhoRecvAlert
methods.description: Processes received alert messages within the TLS Alert Handler.

methods.name: TlsAhoSendAlert
methods.description: Sends alert messages with specified level and description within the TLS Alert Handler.
